summary: This is an email chain from June 7, 2021, forwarding Ejustice records for a testifying witness to be added to the Epstein share. It indicates ongoing case management and evidence handling related to a witness.

events.title: Forwarding of Ejustice Records
events.description: Email correspondence forwarding Ejustice records for a testifying witness to be added to the Epstein share folder.

keyFacts: Email dated June 7, 2021, regarding Ejustice records for a testifying witness.
Records were to be added to a shared folder related to the Epstein case.
The correspondence indicates ongoing case management and evidence handling in 2021.
